ocr_markdown:
```markdown
2. Mark for Review

Carrie has $c$ dollars and Marjani has $m$ dollars. Carrie has 4 times as many dollars as Marjani, and together they have a total of $40.00. Which system of equations represents this situation?

A. 
$$
c = 4m \\
c + m = 40
$$

B. 
$$
m = 4c \\
c + m = 40
$$

C. 
$$
c = 40m \\
c + m = 4
$$

D. 
$$
m = 40c \\
c + m = 4
$$
```

questions.question_text: Carrie has $c$ dollars and Marjani has $m$ dollars. Carrie has 4 times as many dollars as Marjani, and together they have a total of $40.00. Which system of equations represents this situation?
questions.explanation: Carrie has 4 times Marjani's dollars, so c = 4m. Together they have $40, so c + m = 40.
